attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past year the Ministry of Defense has been in a contract with disposal companies to sell on thier vessels, this includes vessels on loan to the sea cadet corps.

An essential part of SEA cadet training is afloat, and over 9000 cadets in over 400 units use these vessels to further their training, keeping them off the street.

With the MOD removing these vessels cadets will begin to leave the SCC, putting people back drinking cider on a street corner on a night more ASBO's, is that what we need?

We the Undersigned, Petition for you to please, think about the future of the sea cadet corps, and possibly the good cadets the royal navy could lose out on, because budgets have withdwant an intrest.
